text: Abdul Karim Mustaghni (July 11, 1911 â€“ January 13, 2004) was an Afghan scientist and politician. From 1973 to 1977, Mustaghni was Defense Minister of Afghanistan. He helped Mohammed Daoud Khan to remove King Mohammed Zahir Shah from power. == Literature == *Tanwir, Halim (2013). AFGHANISTAN: History, Diplomacy and Journalism. 1. Xlibris Corporation.
